channel.title: [508] File Help [Server Sided]
channel.description: Sup Guys.. I Recently Downloaded A 508 But If I Wanna Make My Self Admin I Got Change Player Rights.. I Did This class\data\characters\mainsave But The File Came Out As .Dat Any Clues? On What Program I Can Use To Edit Or Change?

item.title: [508] File Help [Server Sided]
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:3, topic:394365”][quote author=Nasz link=topic=491549.msg3594635#msg3594635 date=1304960585]

Sup Guys…
I Recently Downloaded A 508
But If I Wanna Make My Self Admin I Got Change Player Rights…
I Did This
class\data\characters\mainsave
But The File Came Out As .Dat Any Clues? On What Program I Can Use To Edit Or Change?

Notepad, Notepad ++, Wordpad, etc… Double click it, then click the little bubble to select a program from a list… browse for your notepad/wordpad or notepad ++ if you got it. But for 508’s, since most of the saved games are encrypted, you’d have to change the rights in the commands.java or something I believe. Should be a String of usernames.
[/quote]

Not “encrypted”, serialized.[/quote]

k.

Read full topic
